## Question Type
- [ ] Challenge Clarification
- [ ] Implementation Help
- [ ] Technology Choice
- [ ] General Discussion
- [ ] Repository Feedback
- [ ] Other

## Challenge Context
- **Challenge Level**: [Beginner/Junior/Middle/Senior]
- **Challenge Name**: [e.g., Hello World API, Todo API]
- **Specific Section**: [e.g., Environment Setup, Implementation Details]

## Your Question
Ask your question clearly and provide context. The more detail you provide, the better we can help!

## What You've Tried
Describe what you've attempted so far and what results you got.

## Additional Context
- Your current tech stack
- Your experience level
- Any relevant code snippets (use code blocks)
- Links to resources you've consulted

## Related Issues/PRs
Have you found any related discussions or solutions?

---

**Note**: For implementation-specific help, consider sharing your code in a GitHub Gist or repository. Remember that these challenges are tech-agnostic - you can choose any programming language and tools!
